nodes.bodyText: Please add "allResults" as a field of SearchRequest since it is part of the request
You'll also need to remove the method parameter here since allResults is in the search request now

I feel a bit pedantic suggesting it, but something like ignoreMaxRows could be clearer about the flags purpose. To me, "getAllResults" reads as a method for retrieving a list of results, rather modifier to a query to override the row limit.
